tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very friendly and listened to our problem patiently. She asked history of illnesses and allergies before prescribing medicines and then explained the need of each medicine to us.She asked us to call if there was no improvement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

She is very kind we regularly meet and she suggest and gave tips for health 

And also she is given medicine normal not heavy dose and also asking feed back and Cunsult over phone also

review: The explanation given was not satisfying enough as the doctor explained what was their in the reports already, which I had already known and was under medication for the same. You consult a doctor for a better analysis and examination of the issue but to read out what is there in the report. I had consulted a few doctors before and after meeting her *** ***** ******* *** ******** **************** *****
Doctor is very patient in hearing complaints and I am very satisfied with the treatment.***** ****** ****** *** **** *********
